teiHeader.fileDesc:
Machine readable text Comparison of Sertorius and Eumenes Plutarch Bernadotte Perrin&responsibility;&fund.NEH; &Perseus.publish;
Plutarch Plutarch's Lives
with an English Translation by Bernadotte Perrin
Cambridge, MA Harvard University Press London William Heinemann Ltd. 1919
8
0674991117

div2.p:
tau=ta e)/stin a(\ peri\ *eu)menou=s kai\ *sertwri/ou
mnh/mhs a)/cia pareilh/famen. e)n de\ th=| sugkri/sei koino
 me
 a)mfote/rois u(pa/rxei to\ ce/nous kai\ a)llodapou\s kai\ fuga/das o)/ntas e)qnw=n te
pantodapw=n kai\ strateuma/twn maxi/mwn te kai\ mega/lwn mega/lwn with Bekker: mega/lwn duna/mewn.
h(goume/nous diatelei=n, i)/dion de\ *sertwri/w| me
 to\ para\ pa/ntwn tw=n summa/xwn dedome/nhn e)/xein dia\ to\ a)ci/wma th
 a)rxh/n, *eu)menei= de\ to\ pollw=n diaferome/nwn peri\ th=s h(gemoni/as pro\s au)to
 e)k tw=n pra/cewn lamba/nein to\ prwtei=on kai\ tw=| me
 a)/rxesqai boulo/menoi dikai/ws ei(/ponto, tw=| de\ a)/rxein mh\ duna/menoi pro\s to\ sumfe/ron u(ph/kouon.

kai\ ga o( me
 *)ibh/rwn kai\ *lusitanw=n *(rwmai=os, o( de\ *xerronhsi/ths *makedo/nwn h)=rxen, w(=n oi( me
 e)/kpalai *(rwmai/ois e)dou/leuon, oi( de\ to/te pa/ntas a)nqrw/pous e)doulou=nto. kai\ *sertw/rios me
 a)po\ boulh=s kai\ strathgi/as qaumazo/menos, *eu)menh\s de\ dia\ th
 grammatei/an katafronou/menos e)f' h(gemoni/an proh=lqen. ou) mo/non toi/nun e)la/ttosi pro\s th
 a)rxh
 a)formai=s, a)lla\ kai\ mei/zosi pro\s th
 au)/chsin e)xrh/sato kwlu/masin *eu)menh/s.

kai\ ga\r a)/ntikrus tou\s e)nistame/nous kai\ kru/fa tou\s e)pibouleu/ontas ei)=xe pollou/s, ou)x w(/sper tw=| e(te/rw| fanerw=s me\n ou)dei/s, la/qra de\ u(/steron kai\ o)li/goi tw=n summa/xwn e)pane/sthsan. dio\ tw=| me\n h)=n pe/ras tou= kinduneu/ein to\ nika=n tou\s polemi/ous, tw=| de\ e)k tou= nika=n o( ki/ndunos u(po\ tw=n fqonou/ntwn.

ta\ me
 ou)=n kata\ th
 strathgi/an e)fa/milla kai\ para/llhla: tw=| de\ a)/llw| tro/pw| filopo/lemos me
 o( *eu)menh\s kai\ filo/neikos, h(suxi/as de\ kai\ pra|o/thtos oi)kei=os o( *sertw/rios. o( me
 ga,
a)sfalw=s kai\ meta\ timh=s biou=n e)co
 e)kpodw
 genome/nw| toi=s prw/tois, maxo/menos kai\ kinduneu/wn diete/lese, tw=| de\ ou)de
 deome/nw| pragma/twn u(pe au)th=s th=s tou= sw/matos a)sfalei/as pro\s ou)k e)w=ntas ei)rh/nhn a)/gein h)=n o( po/lemos.

*eu)menei= me
 ga *)anti/gonos e)ksta/nti tw=n u(pe tou= prwteu/ein a)gw/nwn h(de/ws a)
 e)xrh=to th
 met' au)to
 a)gapw=nti ta/cin, *sertwri/w| de\ oi( peri\ *pomph/i+on ou)de\ zh=n a)pragmo/nws e)pe/trepon. dio\ tw=| me
 e(konti\ sune/baine polemei=n e)p' a)rxh=|, tw=| de\ a)kousi/ws a)/rxein dia\ to\ polemei=sqai.

filopo/lemos me
 ou)=n o( th=s a)sfalei/as th
 pleoneci/an protimw=n, polemiko\s de\ o( tw=| pole/mw| ktw/menos th
 a)sfa/leian.

kai\ mh
 qanei=n ge sune/bh tw=| me
 ou) proaisqome/nw|, tw=| de\ kai\ prosdexome/nw| th
 teleuth/n, w(=n to\ me
 e)pieikei/as, fi/lois ga e)do/kei pisteu/ein, to\ de\ a)sqenei/as, boulo/menos ga fugei=n sunelh/fqh.

kai\ tou= me
 ou) kath/|sxune to
 bi/on o( qa/natos, pa/sxontos u(po\ tw=n summa/xwn a(\ tw=n polemi/wn au)to
 ou)dei\s e)poi/hsen o( de\ feu/gein me
 pro\
ai)xmalwsi/as mh\ dunhqei/s, zh=n de\ met' ai)xmalwsi/an boulhqei/s, ou)/te e)fula/cato kalw=s th
 teleuth
 ou)/q' u(pe/meinen, a)lla\ prosliparw=n kai\ deo/menos tou= sw/matos mo/nou kratei=n dokou=nta to
 pole/mion kai\ th=s yuxh=s au(tou= ku/rion e)poi/hsen.
